abilities.name: Mitosis
abilities.description: Your space docks cannot produce infantry. At the start of the status phase, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control.

faction_techs.name: Bioplasmosis (GG)
faction_techs.description: At the end of the status phase, you may remove any number of infantry from planets you control and place them on 1 or more planets you control in the same or adjacent systems.

faction_techs.name: Letani Warrior II (GG)
faction_techs.description: Cost 1(x2), Combat 7. PRODUCTION 2. After this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die. If the result is 6 or greater, place the unit on this card. At the start of your next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.

agents.name: Letani Ospha
agents.description: ACTION: Exhaust this card and choose a player's non-fighter ship; that player may replace that ship with one from their reinforcements that costs up to 2 more than the replaced ship.

commanders.name: Dirzuga Rophal
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have 12 ground forces on planets you control; After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your units that have PRODUCTION: You may produce 1 unit in that system.

heroes.name: Letani Miasmala
heroes.description: ULTRASONIC EMITTER, ACTION: Produce any number of units in any number of systems that contain 1 or more of your ground forces. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Stymie Ω
promissory.description: After another player moves ships into a system that contains 1 or more of your units: You may place 1 command token from that player's reinforcements in any non-home system. Then, return this card to the Arborec player.

flagship.name: Duha Menaimon
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 7(x2), Move 1, Capacity 5. Sustain Damage. After you activate this system, you may produce up to 5 units in this system

mech.name: Letani Behemoth
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. Sustain Damage, PRODUCTION 2, Plantary Shield. DEPLOY: When you would use your MITOSIS faction ability you may replace 1 of your infantry with 1 mech from your reinforcements instead.

starting_fleet.name: G R O W T H
starting_fleet.description: 1 Carrier, 1 Cruiser, 2 Fighters, 4 Infantry, 1 Space Dock, 1 PDS

abilities.name: Zeal
abilities.description: You always vote first during the agenda phase. When you cast at least 1 vote, cast 1 additional vote for each player in the game including you.

abilities.name: Raid Formation
abilities.description: When 1 or more of your units uses ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE, for each hit produced in excess of your opponent's Fighters, choose 1 of your opponent's ships that has SUSTAIN DAMAGE to become damaged.

faction_techs.name: Aerie Hololattice (Y)
faction_techs.description: Other players cannot move ships through systems that contain 1 or more of your structures. Each planet that contains 1 or more of your structures gains the PRODUCTION 1 ability as if it were a unit.

faction_techs.name: Strike Wing Alpha I
faction_techs.description: Cost 1, Combat 8, Move 2, Capacity 1. Anti-Fighter Barrage 9(x2)

faction_techs.name: Strike Wing Alpha II (RR)
faction_techs.description: Cost 1, Combat 7, Move 2, Capacity 1. Anti-Fighter Barrage 6(x3). When this unit uses ANTI-FUGHTER BARRAGE, each result of 9 or 10 also destroys 1 of your opponent's infantry in the space area of the active system

agents.name: Trillossa Aun Mirik
agents.description: When a player produces ground forces in a system: You may exhaust this card; that player may place those units on any planets they control in that system and any adjacent systems.

commanders.name: Trrakan Aun Zulok
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have 6 units that have ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE, SPACE CANNON, or BOMBARDMENT on the game board; When 1 or more of your units make a roll for a unit ability: you may choose 1 of those units to roll 1 additional die.

heroes.name: Mirik Aun Sissiri
heroes.description: HELIX PROTOCOL. ACTION: Move any number of your ships from any systems to any number of other systems that contain 1 of oyur command tokens and no other player's ships. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Strike Wing Ambuscade
promissory.description: When one or more of your units make a roll for a unit ability: Choose 1 of those units to roll 1 additional die. Then, return this card to the Argent player.

flagship.name: Quetzecoatl
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 7(x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. Sustain Damage. Other players cannot use space cannon against your ships in this system

mech.name: Aerie Sentinel
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. Sustain Damage. This unit does not count against capacity if it is being transported or if it is in a space area with 1 or more of yor ships that have capacity values

starting_techs.name: Adaptable Zealots
starting_techs.description: Choose two of the following: Neural Motivator, Sarween Tools, Plasma Scoring

starting_fleet.name: Strike Force
starting_fleet.description: 1 Carrier, 2 Destroyers, 2 Fighters, 5 Infantry, 1 Space Dock, 1 PDS

abilities.name: Munitions Reserves
abilities.description: At the start of each round of space combat, you may spend 2 trade goods; you may re-roll any number of your dice during that combat round.

abilities.name: Armada
abilities.description: The maximum number of non-fighter ships you can have in each system is equal to 2 more than the number of tokens in your fleet pool.

faction_techs.name: L4 Disruptors (Y)
faction_techs.description: During an invasion, units cannot use SPACE CANNON against your units.

faction_techs.name: Non-Euclidean Shielding (RR)
faction_techs.description: When 1 of your units uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE, cancel 2 hits instead of 1.

agents.name: Viscount Unlenn
agents.description: At the start of a space combat round: You may exhaust this card to choose 1 ship in the active system. That ship rolls 1 additional die during this combat round.

commanders.name: Rear Admiral Farran
commanders.description: After 1 of your units uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE: You may gain 1 trade good.

heroes.name: Darktalon Treilla
heroes.description: DARK MATTER AFFINITY. ACTION: Place this card near the game board; the number of non-fighter ships you can have in systems is not limited by laws or by the number of command tokens in you fleet pool during this game round. At the end of that game round, purge this card.

promissory.name: War Funding Ω
promissory.description: After you and your opponent roll dice during space combat: You may reroll all of your opponent's dice. You may reroll any number of your dice. Then, return this card to the Letnev player.

flagship.name: Arc Secundus
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 5(x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 5(x3). Other players' units in this system lose PLANETARY SHIELD. At the start of each space combat round, repair this ship.

mech.name: Dunlain Reaper
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. DEPLOY: At the start of a round of ground combat, you may spend 2 resources to replace 1 of your infantry in that combat with 1 mech.

starting_fleet.name: Battle-Ready Armada
starting_fleet.description: 1 Dreadnought, 1 Carrier, 1 Destroyer, 1 Fighter, 3 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Scavenge
abilities.description: After you gain control of a planet, gain 1 trade good.

abilities.name: Nomadic
abilities.description: You can score objectives even if you do not control the planets in your home system.

faction_techs.name: Chaos Mapping (B)
faction_techs.description: Other players cannot activate asteroid fields that contain 1 or more of your ships. At the start of your turn during the action phasem you may produce 1 unit in a system that contains at least 1 of your units that has production.

faction_techs.name: Floating Factory I
faction_techs.description: Move 1, Capacity 4. PRODUCTION 5. This unit is placed in a space area instead of on a planet. This unit can move and retreat as if it were a ship. If this unit is blockaded, It is destroyed.

faction_techs.name: Floating Factory II
faction_techs.description: Move 2, Capacity 5. PRODUCTION 7. This unit is placed in a space area instead of on a planet. This unit can move and retreat as if it were a ship. If this unit is blockaded, It is destroyed.

agents.name: Captain Mendosa
agents.description: After a player activates a system: You may exhaust this card to increase the move value of 1 of that player's ships to match the move value of the ship on the game board that has the highest move value.

commanders.name: Rowl Sarrig
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have 3 space docks on the game board. When you produce fighters or infantry: You may place each of those units at any of your space docks that are not blockaded.

heroes.name: Gurno Aggero
heroes.description: ARMAGEDDON RELAY. ACTION: Choose 1 system that is adjacent to 1 of your space docks. Destroy all other player's infantry and fighters in that system. The, purge this card.

promissory.name: Ragh's Call
promissory.description: After you commit 1 or more units to land on a planet: Remove all of the Saar player's ground forces from that planet and place them on a planet controlled by the Saar player. The return this card to the Saar player.

flagship.name: Son of Ragh
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 5(x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. SUSTAIN DAMAGE, ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE 6(x4).

mech.name: Scavenger Zeta
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. DEPLOY: After you gain control of a planet, you may spend 1 trade good to place 1 mech on that planet.

starting_fleet.name: Mobile Factory
starting_fleet.description: 2 Carriers, 1 Cruiser, 2 Fighters, 4 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Guild Ships
abilities.description: You may negotiate transactions with players who are not your neighbors.

abilities.name: Arbiters
abilities.description: When you are negotiating a transaction, action cards can be exchanged as part of a transacation.

abilities.name: Masters of Trade
abilities.description: You do not have to spend a command token to resolve the secondary ability of the 'Trade' strategy card

faction_techs.name: Quantum Datahub Node (YYY)
faction_techs.description: At the end of the strategy phase, you may spend 1 token from your strategy pool and give another player 3 of your trade goods. If you do, give 1 of your strategy cards to that player and take 1 of their strategy cards.

faction_techs.name: Production Biomes (GG)
faction_techs.description: ACTON: Exhaust this card and spend 1 strategy token from your strategy pool to gain 4 trade goods and choose 1 other player; that player gains 2 trade goods.

agents.name: Carth of Golden Sands
agents.description: During the action phase: You may exhaust tis card to gain 2 commodities or replenish another player's commodities.

commanders.name: Gila the Silvertongue
commanders.description: Unlock: Have 10 Trade Goods; When you cast votes: You may spend any number of trade goods; cast 2 additional votes for each trade good spent.

heroes.name: Harrugh Gafhara
heroes.description: GALACTIC SECURITIES NET When one or more of your units use PRODUCTION: You may reduce the cost of each of your units to 0 during this use of PRODUCTION. If you do, purge this card.

promissory.name: Trade Convoys
promissory.description: ACTION: Place this card face-up in your play area. While this card is in your play area, you may negotiate transactions with players who are not your neighbor. If you activate a systemthat contains one or more of the Hacan player's units, return this card ot the Hacan player.

flagship.name: Wrath of Kenara
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 7 (x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. Sustain Damage. After you roll a die during a space combat in this system, you may spend 1 trade good to apply +1 to the result.

mech.name: Pride of Kenara
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. Sustain Damage. This planet's card may be traded as part of a transaction; if you do, move all of your units from this planet to another planet you control.

starting_fleet.name: Merchant Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 2 Carriers, 1 Cruiser, 2 Fighters, 4 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

planets.name: Mecatol Rex
planets.legendary_ability: At the end of the status phase, gain 1 victory point if you control Mecatol Rex.
